titles.title: A bill to provide for the payment to States of plot allowances for certain veterans eligible for burial in a national cemetery who are buried in cemeteries of such States.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5691)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

bill.summary: 5/12/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary to pay to the appropriate State or local political entity a $150 burial plot or interment allowance for the burial of any veteran who is: (1) eligible for burial in a national cemetery; and (2) buried in a cemetery that is used solely for the interment of persons so eligible and that is owned by such State or political entity.
